attributes.action: Time to secure & close the UK borders for national security
attributes.background: With the threat to the UK's national security, we need to close and secure our borders with the imminent threat to the UK and it's citizens

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107516

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
